settings.text: Designed for small spaces and personal wellness. Create a warm, private, and relaxing daily atmosphere.

settings.custom_liquid:
Your Daily Wellness Retreat

From compact one-person models to spacious family-size saunas, our indoor saunas use minimalist design, natural materials and advanced heating technology to create a peaceful, healthy space in your home.

Shop 1-Person Saunas

settings.text:
Outexer 1-person infrared sauna

Outexer's 1 person infrared sauna is designed for personal relaxation and daily health management, suitable for small spaces such as bedrooms, study rooms, and gyms. We select natural woods such as Canadian hemlock, okoume and cedar, combined with a low-electromagnetic radiation carbon fiber heating system and an intelligent control module to create a private warm therapy space for you.

The simple and compact design allows it to easily integrate into the home environment, and even the space is limited. The tempered glass door and breathable structure allow sufficient light and air circulation inside, creating a transparent and safe sauna experience. Let every sweating be a full-body stress release.


Why choose Outexer?

More private and more relaxing:¬†Outexer single sauna adopts a wrap-around heating design, which heats up quickly and has a uniform heat sensation, suitable for enjoying quiet healing time when alone.

Safety and intelligence:¬†Built-in smart panel to adjust temperature, time, light and Bluetooth speakers. Multiple safety protections make it easier to use.

Save space without sacrificing comfort:¬†Each product has been carefully optimized to make it comfortable to sit even in a small space.

Easy to clean and maintenance-free:¬†The natural wood surface is smooth and can be cleaned with a damp cloth daily. The heating components have passed multiple rounds of testing and are stable and durable.


Health benefits of sauna

  • Relieve fatigue and improve body recovery
  • Promote blood circulation and relieve shoulder and neck pain
  • Improve sleep quality and relax the nervous system
  • Deep sweating and detoxification, clean pores
  • Enhance immunity, prevent colds and chronic fatigue


Frequently Asked Questions (1 Person Sauna FAQs)


1. What is the difference between a single infrared sauna and a steam sauna?
Infrared saunas use infrared rays to directly penetrate deep into the skin for heating, without relying on steam, so the temperature is lower but the sweating is more complete. It is more suitable for daily use and does not require complex ventilation or drainage systems.

2. Is your sauna difficult to assemble?
No. All Outexer one-person saunas are modular in design. You can complete the installation in a short time by following the instructions or watching our video tutorials. Most customers can complete the assembly independently.

3. Does the single sauna have any circuit requirements?
Most Outexer 1-person saunas have a power of about 800W-1500W, and can usually use ordinary household sockets (120V, 15A) directly.

4. What is the size of a single sauna?
Our 1-person saunas are compact in design and suitable for small bedrooms, bathrooms or fitness areas. The specific dimensions can be found on each product detail page.

From compact one-person models to spacious family-size saunas, our indoor saunas use minimalist design, natural materials and
advanced heating technology to create a peaceful, healthy space in your home.

settings.heading: Wellness Starts at Home
settings.text:
Outexer 1-person infrared sauna is designed for your personal relaxation and daily health! It is naturally suitable for small spaces such as bedrooms, study rooms, and gyms. We carefully select top-quality natural woods such as Canadian hemlock, okoume, and cedar, and integrate low-electromagnetic radiation carbon fiber heating systems and intelligent control modules - just to give you an extremely private, warm and efficient exclusive therapy space.

The design is minimalist and compact, easily integrated into the home, and a professional sauna can be enjoyed in a small space. Equipped with tempered glass doors and scientific breathable structures, it ensures sufficient light and free air circulation - every experience is transparent and safe. Let every sweat be a complete release of stress!

settings.title: Hear from Real Outexer Customers
settings.sub_title: Real feedback from happy sauna owners

settings.custom_liquid:
Outexer 1-Person Sauna FAQs

How long will it take to receive my sauna?
We process orders in 1‚Äì3 business days, and shipping usually takes 5‚Äì12 business days. So you‚Äôll have your sauna delivered in about 6‚Äì15 business days from your order.
Is your sauna difficult to assemble?
No. All Outexer one-person saunas are modular in design. You can complete the installation in a short time by following the instructions or watching our video tutorials. Most customers can complete the assembly independently.
What if my package arrives damaged?
üìå Cause: The package may have been crushed or bumped during shipping.

üí° Action: Please take clear photos of the entire box, shipping label, and SKU label. Then, record a complete unboxing video (if necessary). If you discover any damaged parts inside the box, we will immediately ship the damaged parts free of charge or arrange compensation.
Does the single sauna have any circuit requirements?
Most Outexer 1-person saunas have a power of about 800W-1500W, and can usually use ordinary household sockets (120V, 15A) directly.
Do I need to ventilate my sauna?
Most Outexer saunas have ventilation and electrical components located at the top, so it is important to keep the top of the sauna open to allow heat and air circulation. You do not need to install a separate ventilation system, just make sure the top area is not blocked and has enough space for ventilation.
How much clearance do I need around my sauna?
We recommend leaving at least 2" of space between the sauna and surrounding walls. This is especially true near ventilation or wiring areas. If necessary, you can move the sides of the sauna closer to the wall, but avoid completely enclosing it to ensure good air circulation.
